duties_responsibilities.duty: Pitch, report, and edit stories for Weekand.com, working closely with the Editorial Director and Social Media Editor.
Responsible for publishing some 50 articles a month and executing a strategic content plan to grow a loyal audience.
Collaborate across teams, including business intelligence, editorial, commerce, revenue, and product.
Leverage e-commerce, SEO, and social media packaging to build traffic and revenue.
Ensure all work meets the highest quality standards while also meeting KPIs.
Take a creative, thoughtful, data-informed approach to writing lifestyle and service content.
